services_id.title: Manajemen Properti
services_id.desc: Layanan pengelolaan properti, pemeliharaan aset dan peralatan mekanikal/elektronik hingga jasa kebersihan dan pest control.

services_id.title: Jasa Pengamanan & Konsultan Keamanan
services_id.desc: Layanan keamanan yang professional, terlatih, dan berpengalaman dengan lebih dari 2.000 personel di 132 kota di Indonesia dan terus bertambah.

services_id.title: Pusat Pelatihan
services_id.desc: Menyelenggarakan berbagai pendidikan dan pelatihan Sumber Daya Manusia di bidang keamanan dan pengelolaan properti.

services_id.title: Supervisi & Desain
services_id.desc: Menyediakan solusi kebutuhan perencanaan, perancangan, dan pengawasan dengan fokus pada gedung bertingkat, perhotelan, perumahan serta pertamanan.

services_en.title: Building Management
services_en.desc: Property management services include management and maintenance of building and area facilities.

services_en.title: Consultancy and Security
services_en.desc: We provide security services supported by professional security personnel who have graduated from various trainings in accordance with standard operating procedures.

services_en.title: Training Center
services_en.desc: Global Jasa Sejahtera provides solutions to improve the competence and quality of Human Resources with various education and training.

services_en.title: Design and Supervision
services_en.desc: A good plan will greatly affect the work process in designing the design of your existing rooms in high-rise buildings, housing, to landscaping concepts.
